p.s: Do you have a spy club already , but need something else in the club ?
Or do you need to just DO something fun to pass the time ?
Either way , here 's how you make a successful spy school ... ( just so you know , this article is meant to be for kids )

item.s: If you do n't have one , start a spy club !
They usually have 3-6 people in them .
You can have a big army or a small group of spies .
Here are the jobs you will need to assign : President : This is the main leader spy .
You can have just one or , if your group is big , you can even have a small staff of 3-5 people .
Lone Spy : This is the spy who spies the most .
This spy should be allowed around town already .
Scout : This spy searches out the spying area for tiny cameras , hidden weapons , etc.
This stuff you will probably only find if you have an enemy spy club .
Computer Spy :
Gets info from web and keeps track of it in a notebook .
Conclusion
Spy : figures out things .
Trainees : rookie spies who are being trained .
Have everybody come up with a spy name ( Agent ______ ) .
Finally , let 's get down to the school .
If you have a staff , they will be teachers .
If you do not have a staff then choose a few advanced spies .
Make the arrangements .
Who will teach defense/attack classes ?
Who will teach about disguising ?
Have at LEAST one person in your club take karate .
They will be the defense/attack teacher .
This is an optional step .
If there is no karate person then just teach simple punching , kicking , and slapping routines .

Optional : make a form of money , have a spy store with gadgets , and reward people with that form of money , and they get to shop in the store with it .
For more info , contact cathrinegrace101 on moshi monsters .
Have an official place for the school .
Make a time every week for spy school- YOU get to choose how many times you have it per week .
I would say only about 3 times , as spies need breaks , and they need time for homework/fun .
If you want , you can occasionally assign homework .
Only something that would take five or ten minutes though .
Spies do not like wasting time .
Eventually , you WILL get caught on a mission .
On missions , always have an excuse/Plan B. Your friends may get mad if you have the school too often , or if the homework is long/hard .
They WILL quit if they get too mad !
if they get mad at all , cut down on the spy school and spy homework !
